name: new duckling
notes:
a crochet version of my lucky duckling pattern!

there are two pdfs - one us version crochet and the other uk

i use basic single (double uk) crochet and i've added quite a few directional instructions so this could be deemed as 'beginner friendly'

i've added links to the yarn i used although you can use whatever you like/ can get your hands on to be honest.

i've also added links to the eyes i used and indeed links to the yarn should you wish to make yours similar.

i hope you enjoy creating  this little crochet fellow!

claire
xx
